website_summaries.verdict: The Pixel XL has top-notch hardware, the latest Android software, and guaranteed support from Google, making it one of the best big-screen Android phones you can buy.
pros: Latest Android 7.1 software and guaranteed updates
cons: No waterproofing, expandable storage, or wireless charging

customer_reviews.title: The phone received was not new, and stopped working within one day of use
customer_reviews.text: Used the phone for 1 day before it got stuck in a restart loop. I took it to a repair show, where I was told the screen had clearly been previously replaced (now that I look I can see that the screen is slightly raised on one end) and that the previous damage done was probably the reason the phone is now malfunctioning. This is pretty disappointing considering I paid for a 'new' phone. Awaiting news on a refund.
customer_reviews.author: teamwillems

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone — Not 2nd hand though!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone but returning because intermittent fault(keeps turning off). Other than that, really good phone even in 2019. They wanted to give me a £15 partial refund after I moaned a bit. Nice one, it cost more like £100 for a new battery. Not really acceptable condition if it turns off is it. I wouldn't go for the £140 option from these guys. Maybe the 190 but remember they seem to think intermittent faults are something the customer should put up with.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had but battery fails after 2 years - would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is without doubt the best phone I've ever had - excellent camera, fast charge. Very user-friendly. It's also the most expensive phone I've ever had. I bought it in November 2017 for £600 and now in October 2019 the battery is so unreliable it can cut out at any moment even if it's at 50%. At such a high price it's shameful that it doesn't even last two years. Unfortunately because I bought it on Amazon I don't think Google will help me so I've learned my mistake and will not buy a phone on Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Miss S.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than a year. Poor battery life kept getting worse. Phone would just die after about 50% battery life. Today I find the screen is cracked because the battery has swollen
customer_reviews.author: pikachujird

customer_reviews.title: Luckily I don't believe this phone is supported now
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the one I bought was in a faulty batch but so many issues with basic telephone and screen functionality after stock updates. A big no no
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: The price is to high, anyway. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Battery easily drained full of scratches. Not worth of lying this seller. They should give more description.
customer_reviews.author: iNormanVariety

customer_reviews.title: best phone i ever had
customer_reviews.text: best phone i ever had! and I was a iPhone guy from the very first up till i bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pixel Phone by Google - 128GB - Pixel`s battery
customer_reviews.text: Bought it November 2016 and now the full battery lasts only about 6/7 hours. It is disappointing. Can this be fixed? How?
customer_reviews.author: MARIO  F  N   MENDES

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: The item can not connect with wifi,I need return it !
customer_reviews.author: lu j.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone out there
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything bad about this pbone or seller. Phone itself is absolutely amazing. Looks good, feels good and works even better :) Seller deserves 10/10 for being understandable and solving problems with my order in no time. Problems were of course my mistake as i messed up with my order but i got everything sorted out. Thanks again seller :) I am very happy with purchase, but i totaly forgot i should order an eu power brick with it since it only comes with uk plug. Otherwise 10/10 item. Will defenitley come back when i need something :)
customer_reviews.author: David Sporiš

customer_reviews.title: should have better battery and is lower spec than other top phones
customer_reviews.text: should have better battery and is lower spec than other top phones. some apps stutter. but great camera and great clean android implementation
customer_reviews.author: phillip vandervoort

customer_reviews.title: The phone was well described with 12 months guarantee.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone's speed of response, storage and Android 9. Even though announced 3 years ago, the Google Pixel, refurbished, is excellent value compared currently announced mobile phones.
customer_reviews.author: Samadhi World

customer_reviews.title: prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product, prompt delivery. Buying tech online from amazon marketplace can be a risk but I can confirm this is phone is exactly as stated. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Eppie

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone if it did not just die on me after 5 months at 339 pounds not good enough
customer_reviews.author: saul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as good as new phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. In depth details of it can be found elsewhere online. Phone was as good as new and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: 88tpm

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: iOS user for many years. Now Google have launched this. Amazing!!!!! Being in the Android ship gives you open mind, it moves you away from thinking only Apple is best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Madness!
customer_reviews.text: Over £800 for a phone? My first 3 cars didn't cost that much, world's gone raving mad...
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: A thoroughly excellent, fast, and reliable smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: A thoroughly superb phone! Both cameras are superb and the main camera produces the best shots I've ever seen on a smartphone. The OLED display is beautiful with excellent colour and brightness, even in bright sunlight. The battery life is great and the performance is excellent, even on very demanding games.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Geoffries
